About.title: How it works
About.note: Note: This form does not guarantee your enrollment in WIC. Your eligibility will be confirmed when you have your recertification appointment with WIC.

answer.body: We only need to collect information about WIC participants who have a recertification appointment.
answer.header: Answer questions about who is recertifying in your household

upload.body: We will help you figure out which ones you need. If you usually have to show income information, like paystubs or tax returns, have those documents accessible before you start.

appointment.body: Your local WIC clinic staff will confirm the information and documents you sent.

AdjunctiveEligibility.label: Are they enrolled in any of these programs?
programs: FDPIR (Food Distribution Program on Indian Reservations)

situations: The ID document shared previously with WIC has expired
nameIdQuestion.legend: Have you or any WIC participants in your household experienced any of these situations in the past year?

moveQuestion.legend: Have you moved in the past year?

Confirm.title: Thanks for starting your recertification!
Confirm.intro: During your appointment, your local WIC clinic staff will confirm the information you sent.
Confirm.previouslySubmittedAlert: You cannot review information after it’s submitted. If you need to make changes or add additional information, you must go through this form again.

feedback.heading: Help us improve this experience
feedback.intro: We’d like to hear more about your experience using this site. Please take a few minutes to share your feedback.

additionalInfo.label: Is there anything else you'd like to share with WIC staff?
additionalInfo.hint: For example: Nutrition updates, household changes, or questions.

Count.title: Who in your household is recertifying?
Count.intro: We only need to collect information about WIC participants who have a recertification appointment.
listItems: For a child near their birthday or a year after initial enrollment.
Shortly after giving birth for a parent that received WIC while pregnant.
Count.example: For example, we do not need to collect information about a child who will have their mid-certification appointment, or for a parent who has been breastfeeding or using formula for an infant for the past year.

householdSize.label: How many people in your household will recertify their WIC benefits at the next appointment?

Count.previouslySubmittedAlert: You can't edit this page. If you need to update the number of people who will recertify, click Continue and use the "Add another WIC participant" or "Remove participant" buttons.

Demo.alertText: This site is a demonstration project and for example purposes only. To view the staff portal, please visit this <1>accompanying example site</1> . If you'd like to apply for WIC, please visit <0>SignUpWIC.com</0> .

Details.intro: Reminder: We only need to collect information about WIC participants who have a recertification appointment.
Details.title: Tell us about who you're recertifying for

Index.eligible: You can fill out this form if:

feedback.heading: Already attended your recertification appointment?
feedback.text: We’d love to hear feedback about your experience. Please respond to <0>this 3 question survey</0> .

Index.intro: You can now prepare for your recertification appointment with your local Montana WIC clinic.
ifList: You have received this link from your local WIC clinic.
You or someone in your household currently receives WIC benefits.
You or someone in your household is eligible for a recertification in the next 30 days.
Index.note: Not all WIC households can use this form. If you do not have a permanent address, if nobody in your household earns money, or if you do not have identity documents, then you cannot use this form ahead of your recertification appointment.
Index.resetSession: You’ve been timed out due to inactivity. Any information you entered before can't be retrieved.
Index.time: This form should take about 15 minutes to complete.
Index.title: Start your recertification for Montana WIC

feedback.text: We want to hear from you! <0>Give feedback or ask questions about this site</0> .

footer1.text: This site is built in partnership with <0>Montana WIC</0> .

footer2.text: This institution is an equal opportunity provider. <0>USDA Non-Discrimination Statement</0> .

NameInput.legal: Legally as it appears on an ID document.

FileUploader.label: Upload documents
FileUploader.noFilesAria: Click to choose a file to upload
FileUploader.additionalFilesAria: Click to choose another file to upload
FileUploader.filetypehint: You can select a PDF, JPEG, PNG, or GIF file.
FileUploader.fileTypeError: This is not a valid file type.
FileUploader.fileSizeError: This file is over the maximum size
FileUploader.fileCountError: You have reached the maximum number of files; please remove files before adding additional files

Review.intro: Review the information on this page before submitting. If you want to make changes, select 'Edit' to go to the section you want to change.
Review.title: Review and submit your information.

household.countHeading: Who in your household is recertifying?
household.detailsHeading: Tell us who you're recertifying for
household.adjunctive: Enrolled in Medicaid, SNAP, TANF, or FDPIR
household.noAdjunctive: Not enrolled in Medicaid, SNAP, TANF, or FDPIR

changes.heading: Household changes
changes.idChangeHeading: Have you or any WIC participants in your household experienced any of these situations in the past year?
changes.addressChangeHeading: Have you moved in the past year?

contact.heading: Additional information
contact.comments: Is there anything else you'd like to share with WIC staff? (optional)

Upload.title: You need to upload documents.
Upload.intro: We’ve listed out what kind of information you need to provide and which documents you can use. If you don't have any of these documents, call your local WIC office and they can help determine next steps.

address.label: Show proof of address
address.heading: Documents that show your address include:
examples: Driver's license or ID card with current address
Tribal ID Card or Tribal Enrollment Letter

identity.label: Show proof of identity
identity.heading: Documents that show identity include:
examples: Tribal ID Card or Tribal Enrollment Letter
Public assistance card or eligibility letter (Medicaid, HMK Plus, SNAP or TANF)
For infants and children: Certificate of Live Birth, Crib Card, Hospital Identification (bracelet)

income.label: Show proof of income
income.heading:
Upload proof of income for each member of your household that earns money.

Documents that show income include:
examples: Pay stubs from the past 60 days
Award letter from unemployment, SSI, etc

previouslyuploaded.label: These are files you submitted previously:

filetips.title: Tips for uploading images or PDFs

format.title: If your file is not in one of these formats, try one of the following:
items: Take a picture of the document
Take a screenshot of the document
Save the document as a PDF or image, and try uploading again

email.title: If your document is attached to an email:
items: Open the file on your computer or phone
Save it as a PDF or image, and try uploading again

errors.empty: Upload at least 1 file to continue.
errors.fileCount: You can only upload up to  {{ maxFileLimit }} files. If you need to upload more than {{ maxFileLimit }} files, you must go through this form again.
errors.otherFileError: We could not upload: {{disallowedFileNames}}. Choose a PDF or an image file smaller than {{ sizeLimit }} MB.

asterisk: All required questions are marked with an asterisk
routingError: Some required responses are missing. Please go back through the form and answer all required questions.
